name: Outbreak: The New Nightmare
description: Return to the roots of co-op survival horror as you face monstrous hordes, scrounge for supplies and attempt to survive the nightmare. You have one life. Make it count!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 TI / AMD Radeon R9 270X DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290X DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 12 GB available space Sound Card: Hardware Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended.
